archimate:Constraint.name: A training for Finland is not in scope at this time, because the legislation and needs around it are different than in Sweden & Norway
archimate:Constraint.documentation:
Finland Protective Security Training is back in scope as decided by Lingskog in Security Awareness Project Status - 2023-05-17
Meeting with Mikael Lingskog 9/5: Requested this to be clarified. This constraint only applies to National Security Act educations, where Finland at the moment is excluded.
